dt-option.name: language.searchBuilder.delete
dt-option.summary: Set the html of the SearchBuilder delete criteria button

type.description: `-init language.searchBuilder.delete` changes the html of the SearchBuilder delete criteria button.

dt-option.description:
As standard, SearchBuilder will set the delete criteria button's html to '&times'. Which is an html character for a small cross.
The value of `-init language.searchBuilder.delete` is passed into an `-api i18n()` function.

example.title: Change title attribute for SearchBuilder delete criteria button
